greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function of numbers having distinct digits in their decimal representation.
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: lst = {}; Do[If[Select[Tally[IntegerDigits[n]][[All, 2]], # > 1 &] == {}, AppendTo[lst, 1], AppendTo[lst, 0]], {n, 0, 104}]; lst (* _Arkadiusz Wesolowski_, May 10 2012 *)
program: a178788 n = fromEnum $ nub (show n) == show n
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 30 2010
